name: Behind the Beyond
storyline:
Like in many Hungarian folktales the story starts with Johnny, the youngest son of a very poor man. Johnny's two elder brothers have already left their parental home and became successful craftsmen. Now, it is Johnny's turn to make something of himself. So he sets off first into the nearest village to find a job for himself.

In the game demo, soon after arriving, he encounters two separate quests. One of them is about a mysterious burning light that appears at night and terrorises the village. The other is an old woman whose keeps loosing her geese to an ellusive thief. Magic is suspected to be involved.
summary:
Behind the Beyond is a point & click adventure set in a magical world of Hungarian folklore. Johnny, the youngest son of a poor man sets off to find a job, and on his way uncovers all sorts of magical mysteries in the kingdom.

The game mixes classic point & click mechanics with some RPG elements e.g. skills that can be improved, or equipment that can be changed.
